projects.title: LEDGERÂº
projects.subtitle: Mobile Application
projects.description: Experience the world of manga like never before with this open-source manga reading application for iOS and iPadOS. Dive into a diverse library of manga titles from various genres and enjoy a seamless reading experience on your Apple devices. With its user-friendly interface and customizable features, this app is a must-have for manga enthusiasts seeking an immersive and enjoyable way to read their favorite stories on the go.

projects.title: CS Paint
projects.subtitle: Java Application
projects.description: Inspired by Microsoft's MS Paint, I sought out to recreate the familiar and user-friendly drawing experience while showcasing the programming concepts I learned throughout my semester in CSCI 2400. CS Paint provides a simple and intuitive interface for users to create and edit drawings. It offers various tools and features commonly found in drawing applications, allowing users to express their creativity and create artwork.

projects.title: QuizME
projects.subtitle: Web Application
projects.description: Designed to be an immersive study tool with AI capabilities, used to create flash cards and quizzes for students, and matching games for memories

projects.title: EZ-Shift
projects.subtitle: Web Application
projects.description: Platform built to convert playlists from one music streaming service to another

references.name: Nicholas Shook
references.title: Attorney, Software Developer
references.testimony: Nisar is a fantastic UI developer and engineer. He helped our website become ARIA-compliant by enforcing accessibility standards in a thorough, test-driven way. We appreciated his clear communication and his awesome work product in our time spent together. I highly recommend booking Nisar for UI needs.

references.name: Josef Kruckenberg
references.title: Drupal Contributor
references.testimony: Working with Nisar was a great experience. His drive for clean aesthetics and his open communication style helped us collaborate closely on the solution. I appreciated him challenging my concept and implementing a solution that performs well using Gatsby.js. Nisar also performed API integration, design and frontend development leading the project to success in a very agile and quality appreciating manner.
